    • getTopScoringPoints

      public List<Integer> getTopScoringPoints()
      Returns:
      the top of the scoring list of each common goal card

    • getAllPoints

      public List<Integer> getAllPoints(Player player)
      Parameters:
      player - the player to get the points of
      Returns:
      a list of all the points that the player has earned
      • first element(index 0):the points of the personal goal
      • second element(index 1):the points of the common goal/s
      • third element(index 2):the points of the bookshelf
      • fourth element(index 3):the total of all points

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Returns:
      the current player.

      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - the current player to set.

    • getBoard

      the board of the game.

    • start

      public void start()
      Creates the personalGoalDeck, the commonGoalDeck and the board.

    • drawPersonalGoal

      public PersonalGoal drawPersonalGoal()
      Draws a personal goal card from the personalGoalDeck for the player.
      Returns:
      the personal goal card drawn

    • drawCommonGoals

      public List<CommonGoal> drawCommonGoals(boolean isFirstGame)
      Draw the appropriate number of common goal cards from the commonGoalDeck and set their scoring according to the number of players. The number of common goal cards is 1 if it is the first game for any of the players, otherwise it is 2.
      Returns:
      the list of common goal cards drawn

    • fillPersonalGoalDeck

      public void fillPersonalGoalDeck() throws IOException, org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
      This method creates a deck with all the possible personal goals. A personal goal is a matrix with highlighted spaces with the corresponding item tiles that players have to replicate in their bookshelves to get points.
      Throws:
      IOException
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException

    • move

      public void move(List<Item> items, int column)
      This method moves a column or a row of items from the board to the player's bookshelf. If the bookshelf is full, the player gets the end game card and the last round starts. At the end, the turn is changed.
      Parameters:
      items - the list of coordinates of the items to be moved
      column - the index of the bookshelf's column where the items will be moved

    • getCommonGoalDeck

      public List<CommonGoal> getCommonGoalDeck()
      This method returns a list representing the CommonGoalDeck.
      Returns:
      the CommonGoalDeck.

    • getPersonalGoalDeck

      public List<PersonalGoal> getPersonalGoalDeck()
      This method returns the list representing the PersonalGoalDeck.
      Returns:
      the PersonalGoalDeck.

    • isHasGameEnded

      public boolean isHasGameEnded()
      This method returns a boolean representing if the game has ended.
      Returns:
      true ID the game is ended, otherwise false.

    • setHasGameEnded

      public void setHasGameEnded(boolean hasGameEnded)
      This method sets the boolean representing if the game has ended.
      Parameters:
      hasGameEnded - the boolean to set.

    • isLastRound

      public boolean isLastRound()
      This method returns a boolean representing if the last round has started.
      Returns:
      true if the last round has started, otherwise false.
